TopicTitle: Tarsier Space Technology telescope camera not working

Articles.Content: Just an FYI I am using CKAN in 1.8.1 and I am pretty sure there are no conflicting mods (no planet pack either) I have quite a few mods installed (total is 84). But my problem is that I have a satellite in a valid orbit of Kerbin, but when I click on both of the UIs (right click and toolbox button) is just loops the animation of the camera opening instead of actually opening the camera (here is a dropbox with the log and an image with pretty red highlights of my issue https://www.dropbox.com/transfer/AAAAAPkJKjIiQ7vxLNZ-vOkCbGGimNpcvoYluvDpAZ7xQ7SzTa8oAoM ) To reproduce all I did was install TST with researchbodies, KIS, KAS, MM, and Blizzy's toolbar (along with others but as far as CKAN is saying nothing interacts with it) and I created a small probe with both telescopes on it, cheated it into a 400,000m orbit, and tried to open the cameras with the same result of the image in the dropbox.

I also had this issue, and it turns out the most recent version of TST (v7.10) is only compatible with KSP 1.9/.1 and NOT with any other version. Mistake in the version file of the mod flags it as 1.7-1.9 compatible so CKAN will say it's compatible. Roll back to v7.9 and everything works correctly.
